content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Corporate Credit Card Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Purpose\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To establish an objective governing standard for EPAM Systems Inc. (EPAM, Company) and all of its subsidiaries as it relates to Corporate Credit Card (Card) usage.  This Corporate Credit Card Policy (Policy) relies on and complements Global Travel and Expense Policy, Corporate Credit Card Agreements, local policies, and provides Card usage instructions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The policy may be amended at any time and EPAM may depart from it, depending on the circumstances.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Scope, Adherence and Responsibilities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Policy applies to all EPAM employees, regardless of length of service, worldwide, without exception. Strict adherence to this Policy is a condition of employment with EPAM worldwide.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compliance with the Policy will allow employees to utilize the Card to incur business expenses. Compliance with the Policy will allow the Company to safeguard its assets, maintain appropriate accounting records, timely invoice customers, and fulfill its contractual obligations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are expected to be conservative in their spending, and approvers are expected to be diligent in their review, and verification of all expenses charged from the Card. An employee incurring business expense is expected to exercise the same care as a prudent individual making expenditures for personal reasons.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The CTC Group, Corporate Finance, and Internal Audit departments may also monitor policy compliance and perform audits on Card expenses. If card spending is identified to be unreasonable, not in line with Card intent, or expenses incurred on the card are not reported timely with appropriate support, the result can be Card suspension and/or cancellation and other enforcement methods outlined in Section 13 of this Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Debit Cards are out of scope of this Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Definitions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business allowable expense\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": a necessary, reasonable, and appropriate expense with appropriate support incurred for the primary benefit of the EPAM business.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Original receipt\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": the original merchant receipt or invoice issued by the supplier or service provider to document and substantiates the business transaction. When the original receipt is not available or does not contain adequate information, a cancelled check, credit card receipt, supplier statement should be provided. Credit Card transaction receipt alone cannot be considered as full appropriate backup by itself because it does not contain all necessary transaction support data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reasonable expense\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": a necessary business transaction that reflects a prudent decision (not extreme or excessive) to incur the expense on behalf of EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expense fraud\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Fraud can be committed due to Card being compromised and being abused by third party or by intentional inappropriate usage of the Card for personal benefit. If expense/transaction is not recognizable by the cardholder, a dispute form should be filed (WFA Credit Card Management should be contacted for support).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Misuse of the Card\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": An intentional or unintentional inappropriate usage of the Card. If a misuse of the Card occurs, the user should notify CTC Group immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Validation and Safekeeping\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card must be signed immediately upon receipt by the Cardholder (“Ask for ID” signature is permitted). The Card is non-transferrable valuable property of the Company, which requires proper treatment by the Cardholder to protect it from misuse by unauthorized parties. The Card should always be treated with the same care as personal credit cards, bankcards, cash and checks. When using the Card for internet purchases, Cardholders should ensure that the site utilizes industry recognized encryption transmission tools. Card must be returned to the Cardholder after each charge and it should be verified that the returned Card has proper name on the Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Cardholder is considered to be responsible for safe keeping and all usage incurred on the card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. Applying for a Corporate Credit Card (PNC Visa Card)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Standard Travel & Entertainment (T&E) PNC card should be used for travel and entertainment purposes only. The Card is restricted to certain types of expenses/merchants: air tickets, train tickets, hotel, car rental, gas, meals. Those charges will be available at most locations. The card will be declined if it is charged for something non-travel related or from closed category.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only Company employees are permitted to have Corporate credit card. Company contractors are not allowed to have the Card. If an employee reasonably estimates that job duty fulfillment will require expense incurrence they should:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss the situation with their supervisor/Resource Manager (RM)/Account Manager\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Seek and obtain their supervisor`s approval in writing or email form\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Submit a written request with supervisor`s approval to the Support Team Portal providing filled in requisition form, which contains the following cardholder`s name (passport name)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"E-mail address of the cardholder\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card delivery business/office address including postal/zip code (personal address can be used for employees working off-site)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dates when delivery address is valid\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Credit limit amount if it exceeds default EPAM PNC card credit limit amount ($5K)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supervisor`s/RM`s written approval, where PNC card necessity and PNC card credit limit amount are confirmed (even if the request is created by Travel Department)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Justification and explanation for PNC Visa need (purpose)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card expected usage amount and frequency\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Without providing all listed data, PNC Card request will be rejected by Support Team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a requisition form meets all listed requirements Support Team assigns the request to WFA Credit Card Management. All Corporate Credit Card requests will have to be pre-approved or rejected by the Financial Management Authorities. Thus, if the Corporate Credit Card is needed it should be requested in advance, to allow for appropriate processing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As soon as Corporate Credit Card request is pre-approved by the Financial Management Authorities, link to the portal where Card Agreement and Card Policy must be acknowledged via electronic signature will be sent to the cardholder by WFA Credit Card Management together with card activation code/security code. Corporate Credit Card will be ordered after Card Agreement and Card Policy are acknowledged only.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At no time a user may be allowed to hold more than one Corporate Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. Applying for a Corporate Credit Card (Barclays Card)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only Company employees are permitted to have a Corporate credit card. Company contractors are not allowed to have Card. address)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expenditure limit requested for named cardholder (the expenditure limit should be sufficient for 6 weeks' requirements) – default limit is 3500 GBP\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card delivery business/office address including postal/zip code (personal address can be used for employees working off-site) – in case an employee is not UK based/locate Normally cards are to be delivered to EPAM London office\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supervisor`s/RM`s written approval, where Barclay card necessity and Barclay card credit limit amount are confirmed\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Justification and explanation for Barclay card need (purpose)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card expected usage amount and frequency\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Without providing all listed data, Barclays Card request will be rejected by Support Team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a requisition form meets all listed requirements Support Team assigns the request to WFA Credit Card Management. All Corporate Credit Card requests will have to be pre-approved or rejected by the Financial Management Authorities. Thus, if the Corporate Credit Card is needed it should be requested in advance, to allow for appropriate processing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As soon as the Corporate Credit Card request is pre-approved by the Financial Management Authorities, link to the portal where Card Agreement and Card Policy must be acknowledged via electronic signature will be sent to the cardholder by WFA Credit Card Management together with card activation code/security code. The Corporate Credit Card will only be ordered after both the Card Agreement and Card Policy are acknowledged.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At no time a user may be allowed to hold more than one Corporate Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7. Card Activation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once the Card is received, it should be activated by calling the number on the attached sticker and using a security code, which is provided to the Cardholder with a separate e-mail from WFA Credit Card Management.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Card activation code is considered sensitive Company data that may not be disclosed to anyone by the recipient.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8. Lost, stolen, or damaged Card\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Damaged, Lost or stolen cards must be immediately reported to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AND to the Bank's 24-hour toll-free numbers:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PNC Visa Cards\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": 1-800-685-4039\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Barclays Cards\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": 0800-151-0900 or 0333-200-9090 (UK) or +44(0)1604-230-230 (Outside UK)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The card will be cancelled and replacement will be ordered and shipped within a few days. It is the cardholder`s responsibility to identify such situations timely.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9. Expired Card\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expiration month indicates the last month when the Card is valid (for example, 03/14 means the card is active until 31-Mar-14). PNC bank automatically mails replacement cards to Company US office in Newtown prior to expiration (the same card account number and name on the card, new expiration date, new CVC code on the back). Barclays Cards will be sent to the Company UK Office in London prior to the expiration. Usually there`s enough time for replacement card to arrive before the old one has expired.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cardholder will be notified when the replacement Card is received. Cardholder will be asked to provide valid delivery address for the replacement Card. Once the replacement card is received, it will need to be activated.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10. Corporate Credit Card Usage\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Credit Card (Card) is provided to assist employees in effective fulfillment of their duties. Employees will be required to read and acknowledge Card Policy and Card Agreement via electronic signature of the form held on portal prior to receiving the Card. If Card Policy and Card Agreement are not acknowledged, Card will be cancelled.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Violation of any aspect of this Policy may result in the suspension and/or cancellation of the Card. The provision of the Card is not meant to replace the regular Accounts Payable process.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PNC Visa card is a credit card, no PIN is required when paying with this card, unless a specific modification of the card is requested.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The card has a limit (USD) which is a monthly revolving limit. The limit on the card can be changed by request, but require approval by the Cardholder`s Supervisor (Resource Manager), the Financial Management Authorities. Both the estimated USD limit and the estimated duration for how long the limit needs to be increased for will be required. The limit can also be lowered or set to 0 if non-compliance or suspicious activity is identified.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Standard T&E card is restricted to certain type of expenses/merchants: air tickets, train tickets, hotel, car rental, gas, meals. Those charges will be available at most locations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The card will be declined if it is charged for something non-travel related or from closed category.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the charge was expected to go through but it was declined, the bank can be contacted for immediate support (phone number on the back of the card) and asked for a reason of decline. If the Cardholder is asked by the bank for 4-digit PIN for identification purposes, it`s the same one that was used to activate the card. Decline case can be reported to WFA Credit Card Management.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When traveling outside the United States with a PNC Card, the Cardholder may want to call the bank (phone number on the back of the Card), and advise of travel plans so that the bank security department doesn`t block charges abroad. For those cardholders who travel outside of the United States, the cardholder can request a special PNC Chip card for use when traveling overseas. When purchasing gasoline the Cardholder may be asked for billing zip code: it is 18940 (zip code of EPAM headquarters in Newtown, PA).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If cardholder has changed surname or name (for example, in case of marriage), he should notify WFA Credit Card Management to receive a new plastic for the Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Card will be cancelled upon termination of employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.1  General guidelines related to the Card usage\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Credit Card is a privilege that can be revoked anytime by the authority granted to the Corporate Finance Department if usage not in line with Card intent is identifie Card privilege may be also revoked due to misuse or non-compliance with reporting standards\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card is mainly intended for valid business travel expenses: for example, air/rail travel, car rental, transportation, hotel charges and meals (when per diem is not prescribed by local law)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While not general intent of the Card, certain employees (for example members of Marketing, IT, and other departments) may utilize cards for non-travel purchases\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Local Travel and Global Travel and Expense Policies list the allowable expenditures in details\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Cards may be provided to EPAM employees only ( the cards cannot be issued to contractors or non-employees)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card is intended to be utilize Usage will be regularly analyzed for frequency and amoun If Card is not used for 3 or more months or average usage is less than $250/month or $3,000/year, Card may be suspended\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.2  Cases, when the Card cannot be used and may be suspended\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The list is not intended to identify all possible situations and is meant to be used as an example.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card usage for any personal expenses is prohibited and if it occurs, the user should notify CTC Group and WFA Credit Card Management immediatel If CTC Group and WFA Credit Card Management are not notified and such usage is identified, the card will be deactivated immediately and Card privilege will be removed permanentl Violator can be also subject to further penalties from the Company up to and including dismissal and criminal prosecution (further outlined in section 13 of this Policy)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are not permitted to utilize the card for expenditures not permitted by Global Travel and Expense and Local Travel Policies\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Absolutely no ATM Cash withdrawals or Cash Advances from the Corporate Credit Card are permitted without exception\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No charges on behalf of others (unless it is a group meal) are allowe In case of a group meal, the most senior employee in attendance must be responsible for paying the bill; If card is utilized (for example by the Travel Group member) for others, the charge must be reassigned in Concur to the correct party immediately\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card may not be used for any IT-related expenses (consumables such as flash or sim cards, headphones, et under $100 are allowed), as all equipment expenses should be confirmed and made by IT Department\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card may not be used for any subscriptions (licenses, software and et), as such expenses should be confirmed and made by corresponding IT Department or other Department-Specific permission shall be requested by members of appropriate departments to be allowed to use the Card for such expense type\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any employee with unreported overdue Card charges will have their Card deactivated, until all delinquent reports are complete \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Card privilege may be suspended indefinitely\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Card is not meant to replace regular AP proces AP process should be utilized wherever possible\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cardholder is responsible to maintain all support for each transaction\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Occasionally, Card may be declined at certain vendors for a number of reasons outside Company`s control. It is prudent to have some backup means of payment – cash, personal credit or debit card, traveler's checks and etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.3  PNC Corporate Credit Cards as Procurement Cards\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As mentioned previously, the intent of the Card is to assist employees with their travel expenses. However, the Company realizes that the Card is a convenient method of payment for goods and services. Thus certain functions and departments may utilize the Card as a procurement card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card should be used for procurement purposes only by certain positions (Procurement Specialists, IT Specialists, Office Specialists, Training and Development Specialists, Administrative Assistants) as a method of payment for goods and services for the company's needs. Such card can't be used for travel and entertainment purposes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each such department must assign an employee who is responsible for the Card, its usage, and timely reporting.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee can obtain only one type of the card, two types of the card can be received only in exceptional cases and after approval from Financial Management Authorities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Specific requests must be made to permit users to utilize the Card for such purpose.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11. Disputed Items\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is the Cardholder`s responsibility to follow-up on any erroneous charges, returns or adjustments to ensure proper credit is given on subsequent statements. Card expenses/transactions can be tracked in Concur (transactions appear in Concur automatically, normally with a lag of about 2-5 business days from the date of charge to the date transaction is posted into Concur).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a transaction was not authorized/recognized by the Cardholder, WFA Credit Card Management must be notified immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12. Card Expenses Reporting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Card expenses must be reported using Concur in accordance with Global Travel and Expense Policy and will not be processed through any other methods. Each cardholder is expected to learn the expense reporting module in Concur and must be proactive in obtaining help and guidance. All questions related to Card expenses reporting can be addressed to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACostTracking@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACostTracking@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Concur Online Help is located\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.concurtraining.com/customers/tech_pubs/help/en-us/release/expemp_professional/index.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal expenses shall be clearly identified by the Cardholder in the expense report. They are to be deducted from reimbursement or employee's payroll.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All charges must be reported within one month of being incurred without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Card expenses must be reported prior to employee`s dismissal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13. Monitoring and enforcement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CTC Group is assigned with monitoring Card usage for propriety, adequate support, and timeliness of reporting. If violations are identified, CTC Group is to inform the Financial Management Authorities and the Global Chief Compliance Officer immediately. Internal Audit and Corporate Finance Departments may also audit and monitor Card usage.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If Card expenses are not reported in accordance with terms of Global Travel and Expense Policy and local Travel Policies additional notices will be sent to the Financial Management Authorities and the Global Chief Compliance Officer as a part of a Weekly Violations Report.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If Card expenses are not reported properly and timely (within 1 month of charge incurrence), the employee will be notified via e-mail of the need to comply. From the date of notification, the cardholder has 2 weeks to comply. If the compliance is not achieved, the final notification will be sent. If compliance is not achieved within 1 week of second notification the card is deactivated and will not be reactivated regardless of circumstances until compliance is achieved.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once compliance is achieved (in this case it means the expense report with appropriate support is submitted, verified, and approved), the card may be reactivated upon Cardholder's request and approval from CFO, the Financial Management Authorities. If the cardholder becomes in violation of reporting guidelines again, the Card will be deactivated again and Card privilege will be permanently removed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No employee can be eligible for any Company promotional consideration such as raises, bonuses, stock option grants, and etc. while non-compliant with the Card Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Significant violations can result in further sanctions by the Company up to and including termination and criminal prosecution (if fraud is identified).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The final decision to block the Card due to Policy violation is granted to the Chief Financial Officer, the Financial Management Authorities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14. Help\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee encounters any difficulty or has a question that relates to Corporate Credit Card usage WFA Credit Card Management can be contacted at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee encounters any difficulty or has a question that relates to Corporate Credit Card expenses reporting CTC Group can be contacted at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACostTracking@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACostTracking@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
